attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app was terrible. It hacked all my data and it said a lot of racist things. I was offended and appalled at how our president could support this type of behavior!

attributes.review: I can’t believe apple allows this app. The quality and content of this app is atrocious. Apple better get there act together

attributes.title: horrible app. horrible man.
attributes.review: this app hacked into my apple pay information and bought tickets to a trump rally that i did not pay for. all of my information has been stolen and i had to cancel all of my cards immediately. please do not download this app unless you want your personal information hacked and stolen.
